description:
After stumbling upon Naturon Shenron, Goku and Pan must save an entire city from the earthquakes caused by the dragon’s digging.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Drache mit den sieben Sternen
Pan Abunee! Qixinglong no Totte Oki
Pan, tome cuidado para não ser possuída por Chi Shenlong
パンあぶねぇ! 七星龍(チーシンロン)のとっておき
